text_block_list.text:
The day of the Hopeful Stakes had
arrived.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Today's Heartful Gretel was it? I heard
it's the first ever underwater race.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Heheh. So at last then, it is time to
show the world my graceful butterfly!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Just you wait, Pacific Ocean…! 
I'm gonna cross the Japan Trench!

Her ideas sound questionable at best 
but at least she looks in the mood…!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Leave it to me! 
I can cross a trench or two with ease!
